content.question: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the code segment?

choices.label: The loop adds 10 to each element in arr1.
The loop adds 10 to num once for each element in arr1.
The loop adds the value of each element in arr1 to num.
The loop does not change the value of num because it uses an enhanced for loop.

content.answer: The loop adds 10 to num once for each element in arr1.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
